propel.core.functional.projections

Class InvokeDynamic

  • java.lang.Object
    • propel.core.functional.projections.InvokeDynamic

  • public final class InvokeDynamic
extends java.lang.Object
    Some common, re-usable dynamic method invocation projections

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Actions.Action1<java.lang.Object> invokeMethod(java.lang.String methodName)
      Returns a one-argument action which invokes the no-arg method on this argument

      Returns a one-argument action which invokes the one-arg method on this argument
      static Actions.Action0 invokeMethodWithNoArgsOn(java.lang.Object obj, java.lang.String methodName)
      A no-argument action which invokes the method name specified on the given object.
      static Actions.Action1<java.lang.Object> invokeMethodWithOneArgOn(java.lang.Object obj, java.lang.String methodName)
      Returns a one-argument action which invokes the method name specified on the given object, passing the function argument to the invoked method.
